abstract: As Mr. Leno told the MSNBC host Keith Olbermann: “People go to bed earlier now.”
snippet: As Mr. Leno told the MSNBC host Keith Olbermann: “People go to bed earlier now.”
lead_paragraph: In the wake of Jay Leno’s announced move to 10 p.m., Charles McGrath writes about redefining the pajama hour.

headline.main: Leno: ’10:30 Is Like 11:30 Used to Be’
